Obiangwu ma ọ bụ Isuobiangwu, bụ obodo na ward nke Ngor Okpala Local Government Area, Imo State na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria, 31.7 miles (51.0 km) n'okporo ụzọ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke obodo Aba, ozugbo na ọdịda anyanwụ nke Sam Mbakwe International Cargo Airport
Umuene Obiangwu di na northwest of the main village.
Ahịa Eke-Isu na-ejere ndị obodo ahụ ozi n’etiti obodo ahụ
Mkpebi ahụ nwere St Mary's Catholic Church na Assemblies of God Church
E mepere ụlọ akwụkwọ obodo na 1948.
Obiangwu dị ka ọtụtụ obodo ndị ọzọ dị nso na Owerri bụ mpaghara nke "ọrụ ozi ala ọzọ siri ike" na mmalite narị afọ nke 20. E guzobere Community Pry School n'ime obodo ahụ na 1948.
Na Jenụwarị 1981, a kwadoro iwu Enyiogugu Eziala - Obiangwu Umuawa Road.
N'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022 a kọrọ na Federal College of Agriculture, Ishiagu, Ebonyi State emeela ka a kwụọ ụgwọ maka imezigharị ahịa Eke-Isu na Obiangwu.

Na ngwụcha Machị 2023, a kọrọ na ndị na-agba égbè gburu ndị ọrụ atọ nke Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps na Eke-Isu Market n'ime obodo ahụ. Otu onye ọrụ NSCDC kọrọ na ndị ọrụ abụọ sitere na ụlọ ọrụ nkwukọrịta MTN Nigeria gbukwara, mana ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gọnahụrụ nke a.
